title: FS: 10 T201s w/Walter Johnson, Evers/Chance, Walsh, Wallace, Chase
author: npa589

posts.post_title: FS: 10 T201s w/Walter Johnson, Evers/Chance, Walsh, Wallace, Chase
posts.post_content:
These are all extremely nice examples of a unique pre-war tobacco set. Not one of them has a wrinkle. I am still baffled by some of the grades.
Prices include delivery. Payment via PayPal FF is preferred, Venmo/Zelle options as well. 

E-mail for fastest response: [url]the.cards.of.our.pastime@gmail.com[/url] 

T201 HOF Walter Johnson/Street SGC 4.5 ~ $1125
T201 HOF Johnny Evers/Frank Chance SGC 4.5 ~ $425
T201 HOF Bobby Wallace/Lake SGC 5 ~ $250
T201 HOF Ed Walsh/Payne SGC 4 ~ $325
T201 Barrett/Mcglynn SGC 5 ~ $195
T201 Seymour/Dygert SGC 5.5 ~ $235
T201 Hal Chase/Sweeney SGC 4 ~ $165
T201 Mccabe/Starr SGC 6 ~ $325
T201 Woodruff/Williams SGC 4 ~ $95
T201 Killian/Fitzpatrick SGC 4 ~ $95

They really are - I know a lot of people complain about things being undergraded but I couldn't believe the grades on some of these. I had debated sending them to PSA in the first place, and definitely should have. I have a T201 Speaker as well that graded a 2 that I am going to submit to PSA. It's flat out the wrong grade. 

[quote name="823dek" post=2280053]Very nice examples...clean ![/QUOTE]
